name: Luck-Cat
description:
This is my entry for the bitsy secret santa 2020 jam! It also happens to be first completed bitsy game.

My entry is for Rumpel- my prompts were CAT, FRIEND, and JANE AUSTEN

(sadly I know next to nothing about Jane Austen, so the main focus of the game is more, cat and friend)

There are twenty different endings, so replay as much (or as little!) as you would like!

Thank you to all of you on the bitscord as well!

<3 

BigRat
